titleStmt.title: A defence of the profession which the Right Reverend Father in God, John, Late Lord Bishop of Chichester, made upon his death-bed concerning passive obedience, and the new oaths : together with an account of some passages of his Lordship's life.
titleStmt.author: Jenkin, Robert, 1656-1727.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to Robert Jenkin. cf. NUC pre-1956.
